titles.title: GEOTHERMAL Act of 2024
GEOTHERMAL Act of 2024
Grants Enabling Optimized Thermal Handling from Energy Recovered from Mediums that are Aquatic or Land-based Act of 2024

A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to establish a program to provide grants to States to award grants for the establishment of networked geothermal heating and cooling systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
